orchestrator_state.captured_agreement:
LOAN AGREEMENT & TERMS
====================================================================

BORROWER DETAILS:
• Name: Valued Customer
• Loan Purpose: Personal Loan
• Agreement Date: 18-07-2025

LOAN DETAILS:
• Principal Amount: ₹4,00,000
• Interest Rate: 7.5% per annum
• Loan Tenure: 60 months (5 years)
• Monthly EMI: ₹8,015
• Processing Fee: ₹8,000
• Total Amount Payable: ₹4,80,910

REPAYMENT SCHEDULE:
• First EMI Date: 17th August 2025
• Final EMI Date: 22th June 2030
• EMI Deduction: Auto-debit from registered bank account

TERMS & CONDITIONS:
1. Loan amount will be disbursed to the registered bank account only
2. EMI auto-debit mandate is mandatory
3. Any change in employment must be notified immediately
4. Insurance coverage is recommended but not mandatory
5. Loan account will be reported to credit bureaus

CHARGES & FEES:
• Processing Fee: 2.0% of loan amount
• Late Payment Charges: 3% per month on overdue amount
• Prepayment Charges: 2% of outstanding amount if prepaid within 2 years

DOCUMENTATION REQUIRED:
• PAN Card
• Aadhaar Card
• Salary Slips (last 3 months)
• Bank Statements (last 6 months)
• Address Proof

IMPORTANT NOTES:
• Disbursement Timeline: 7-10 working days after agreement signing
• Cooling-off Period: 14 days from agreement date

====================================================================
